TopicTitle: I have discovered a new bug

Articles.Content: Sry no pics but if you leave a splashed down seat in water, leave it and keep running you will run on water!

If you suspect this is in fact a bug, please head on over to the Support section and post a proper bug report according to the guidelines detailed in the stickied threads. You'll also need to provide concise reproduction steps and ensure it is present on a completely stock install.

This thread on its own is not sufficient as a bug report, and is in the wrong section, so I'm going to close this.
